title: My update is taking super long even though i have pretty average internet.

embed.description: Post with 0 votes and 1 views. Shared by orngechevy. league?

body: Any advice? my league has never updated this slow, especially for a 30 mbg download, i have a 5mbs download speed.. so uhhh idk anyone got any help?

replies.body: This may be somehow related to the login issues we were having recently. If you're still having problems getting this patch downloaded, try updating your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just in case they were recently changed.
Same I managed to get past that screen but the 400mb patch after is dling at 37-50 kbs so it says 250 min or so. At around 6% it has reset twice now.
Mine is doing the exact same thing, and when it gets close to finishing, it resets to 0. Has yours changed at all? Is it still not working?
